name: Bubble dream
description:
Dreams provide an opportunity to immerse ourselves in the illusory.  We tend to drown in the temptation of the unreal due to physical and mental pressure from society. Although we are torn by real life, we still have hopes for the future, and to be positive to pursue the beauties of life.

Roles : 
Yunshan Jiang:  Effects, Coding, UI
Jiajun Xu：Animation, Coding
Jialei Zheng: Coding, Voice Over, Menu
Tianyang Zhan: Plot design，Sound Effect
Xiaoxuan Hou: Graphic design( menu background, buttons, portrait)
Jie Gao: Modeling, Texture
